title: CareerSphere Frontend Implementation - Career Guidance Platform with 8 Interactive Modules

requirements.summary: Create landing page with hero section, navigation menu, and call-to-action
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays 'CareerSphere' as the main title
Tagline 'Empowering Students for Skills and Knowledge' is visible below the title
Navigation menu contains Home, Modules, About, Contact, and Login links
'Get Started' button is prominently displayed and clickable

file_operations.description: Add routing configuration for Home, Modules, About, Contact, and Login pages. Set up React Router with route definitions for all navigation destinations.

Create Home page component with hero section displaying 'CareerSphere' title and tagline 'Empowering Students for Skills and Knowledge'. Include the generated hero section illustration at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-students.dim_1200x600.png as a background or feature image. Add a prominent 'Get Started' button that navigates to the Modules page.
Create Navigation component with links to Home, Modules, About, Contact, and Login. Use shadcn/ui navigation components for consistent styling. Ensure responsive mobile menu behavior.

requirements.summary: Create modules section with 8 interactive feature cards in grid layout
acceptanceCriteria: All 8 module cards are displayed in a responsive grid layout
Each card displays a relevant icon, descriptive text, and 'Explore' button
Cards are interactive and visually distinct
Explore buttons link to respective module pages

file_operations.description: Create Modules page displaying 8 feature cards in a responsive grid layout. Use shadcn/ui Card components for each module. Wire each card's 'Explore' button to navigate to its respective module page. Reference generated icons: frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-career-path.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-india-abroad.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-stream-selector.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-ai-chatbot.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-futuremap.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-regional-language.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-ar-explorer.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-degree-finder.dim_128x128.png.

Create reusable ModuleCard component accepting props for icon, title, description, and navigation path. Use shadcn/ui Card component with hover effects and interactive styling. Include 'Explore' button that triggers navigation.

requirements.summary: Create Career Path page with dropdown selector and career options display
acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown menu allows users to select from multiple subjects/interests
Career options are displayed as cards after selection
Each career card shows related degrees and entrance exams
Layout is responsive and organized

file_operations.description: Create Career Path page with shadcn/ui Select component for subject/interest dropdown. Display career options in card-based layout after selection, showing career name, required degrees, and relevant entrance exams. Use local state to manage selection and display logic.
Add route for /career-path that renders the CareerPath page component.

requirements.summary: Create Stream Selector Quiz page with questions and result display
acceptanceCriteria: Quiz displays multiple choice questions one at a time or in a sequence
Users can select answers and navigate through questions
Result page shows recommended stream (Science, Commerce, or Arts)
Result is based on user's quiz responses

file_operations.description: Create Stream Selector Quiz page with multiple choice questions displayed sequentially. Use shadcn/ui RadioGroup for answer selection and Button components for navigation. Track user answers in local state and calculate suggested stream (Science, Commerce, or Arts) based on responses.
Create Stream Result page displaying the recommended stream (Science, Commerce, or Arts) based on quiz answers. Use shadcn/ui Card component to present results with clear visual indicators.
Add routes for /stream-selector and /stream-result that render the StreamSelector and StreamResult page components.

requirements.summary: Create India vs Abroad Comparison page with comparison table and visual indicators
acceptanceCriteria: Comparison table displays India vs Abroad data across Cost, ROI, Lifestyle, and Job Opportunities
Visual indicators or graphs enhance data presentation
Information is clear and easy to compare
Layout is responsive on mobile devices

file_operations.description: Create India vs Abroad Comparison page with shadcn/ui Table component displaying Cost, ROI, Lifestyle, and Job Opportunities columns. Add visual indicators or simple graphs using CSS or SVG to enhance data presentation. Ensure responsive layout for mobile devices.
Add route for /india-vs-abroad that renders the IndiaVsAbroad page component.

requirements.summary: Create Chatbot page with chat interface layout
acceptanceCriteria: Chat interface displays conversation messages in a scrollable area
Message input box allows text entry
Send button submits user messages
Design is welcoming and appropriate for students

file_operations.description: Create Chatbot page with chat interface layout including scrollable message display area, message input box using shadcn/ui Input component, and send button using shadcn/ui Button component. Use local state to manage messages. Implement student-friendly design with welcoming colors.
Add route for /chatbot that renders the Chatbot page component.

requirements.summary: Create FutureMap page with visual career journey timeline
acceptanceCriteria: Visual flow shows progression from School Subjects to Degree to Career to Job
Timeline or roadmap design makes the journey clear and intuitive
Each stage is visually distinct and connected
Layout works on both desktop and mobile

file_operations.description: Create FutureMap page displaying visual career journey flow from School Subjects → Degree → Career → Job using timeline or roadmap-style UI. Use shadcn/ui Card components for each stage with connecting lines or arrows. Ensure responsive design for mobile and desktop.
Add route for /futuremap that renders the FutureMap page component.

requirements.summary: Create Degree Info Finder page with search and degree information cards
acceptanceCriteria: Search bar allows users to search for degrees
Search results display as cards with degree name, duration, entrance exams, and fees
Cards are well-organized and easy to read
Search functionality filters results appropriately

file_operations.description: Create Degree Info Finder page with shadcn/ui Input component for search bar. Display degree information as shadcn/ui Card components showing degree name, duration, entrance exams, and fees. Implement client-side search filtering using local state.
Add route for /degree-finder that renders the DegreeFinder page component.

requirements.summary: Create About section with platform description, problem statement, mission and vision
acceptanceCriteria: About section includes a description of the CareerSphere platform
Problem statement clearly states that students lack career guidance
Mission and vision statements are displayed
Content is well-formatted and readable

file_operations.description: Create About page describing CareerSphere platform. Include sections for problem statement highlighting that students lack career guidance, mission statement, and vision statement. Use shadcn/ui Card or typography components for content organization.
Add route for /about that renders the About page component.

requirements.summary: Create Contact page with form and footer with social links
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form displays fields for name, email, and message
Form includes a submit button
Footer contains social media links
Form validation ensures required fields are completed

file_operations.description: Create Contact page with contact form using shadcn/ui Input and Textarea components for name, email, and message fields. Add shadcn/ui Button for submit. Implement client-side form validation to ensure required fields are completed. Include footer section with social media links.
Create reusable Footer component with social media links. Use consistent styling with shadcn/ui components.
Add route for /contact that renders the Contact page component.

requirements.summary: Implement modern UI design system with gradient colors and responsive layouts
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses soft blue and purple gradients consistently
All pages are fully responsive and work on mobile devices
Typography is clean and readable
Dashboard-style components are used throughout
Cards, icons, and buttons are interactive and visually consistent

file_operations.description: Configure global styles with soft blue and purple gradient color scheme. Define CSS custom properties for primary colors (blue and purple gradients), typography settings for clean readable fonts, and consistent spacing. Apply generated background pattern from frontend/public/assets/generated/pattern-education.dim_800x600.png where appropriate. Ensure all shadcn/ui component variables align with the gradient theme.

Extend Tailwind configuration with custom blue and purple gradient colors matching the design system. Add responsive breakpoints and utility classes for dashboard-style layouts. Configure shadcn/ui theme colors to use soft blue and purple gradients.

Create Layout component that wraps all pages with Navigation and Footer components. Apply consistent spacing, background patterns, and responsive container widths. Use the generated pattern frontend/public/assets/generated/pattern-education.dim_800x600.png for subtle background decoration.
Wrap all routes with the Layout component to ensure consistent Navigation and Footer across all pages.
